issues.title: Morning routine conflicts with workout schedule
issues.description: The current morning routine timing conflicts with the 30-minute workout, causing schedule overlap and stress. Need to reorganize the timing or adjust the routine structure.
issues.author: john-doe

comments.content: Maybe we should move the workout to the evening instead? Or wake up 30 minutes earlier?
comments.author: jane-smith

comments.content: I think waking up earlier would be better. Evening workouts might interfere with wind-down routines.
comments.author: john-doe

issues.title: Need better meal planning templates
issues.description: The current meal planning approach is too vague. We need structured templates for different diet types and meal prep strategies.
issues.author: jane-smith

comments.content: I found some great Mediterranean diet templates online. Should I add them to the task description?
comments.author: jane-smith

issues.title: Reading habit tracking needs improvement
issues.description: Currently just tracking pages read, but would be helpful to track books completed, reading speed, and comprehension notes.
issues.author: john-doe

comments.content: Added reading tracking metadata to the task. Closing this issue.
comments.author: john-doe

issues.title: Kitchen renovation budget unclear
issues.description: The budget range for kitchen renovation is too broad. Need more specific estimates for different tiers of renovation (basic, mid-range, luxury).
issues.author: jane-smith

comments.content: Got quotes from 3 contractors. Basic renovation: $12-15k, Mid-range: $18-25k, Luxury: $30-40k
comments.author: jane-smith

issues.title: Garden planning needs seasonal schedule
issues.description: The vegetable garden task doesn't account for seasonal planting schedules. Need to break it down into seasonal phases.
issues.author: bob-wilson
